name: Kalashtar
book: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.Dual Mind: The kalashtar has advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

actions.Dagger: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Mind Thrust: The kalashtar targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12+1d4 + 10 Wisdom saving throw or take 11 (2d10) psychic damage.
